names.Name: Prices are suspiciously low
Prices are discounted by 1d3
The cashier only accepts barter
A random PC gets their meal paid for by an Odd NPC ahead of them in line
Prices are premium, an additional 1d3
Prices are outrageous, based at 2d6
A long line of customers due to a flash promotion
An Odd NPC in line furiously juggles a handful of Odd Objects while waiting their turn to order
A frail older woman behind you says she's dying and that this might be her very last meal
The restaurant has run out of a basic menu item; the line simmers with nascent riot
A stubborn mannequin struggles with the self-order machine's touchscreen not responding
Representatives of the Mall with clipboards are asking survey questions to those waiting in line
Completely deserted, is someone hiding in the back?
The clerk is identical to a random PC with memories diverging at an interesting moment since the PC entered the Mall
The restaurant staff are literally children who are trying hard but pretty much suck at their jobs
Wisps of thick smoke of different colors escapes whenever the door to the back opens
The tray appears to be a flat living creature, similar to a horseshoe crab
Every meal comes with a free drugged mouse
A dour woman with a cold smile and a suit and tie wears a name tag that says Management
Openly hostile clerk spits in your order, says fuck you, call my manager
A vintage sci-fi robot takes orders and cracks jokes with customers and kitchen staff
A groaning teenage girl, clearly in pain, bravely takes your order
An Odd NPC is working behind the counter
The clerk pets the belly of an adorable cat that's stretched out on the counter, cat hair floats around everywhere
This restaurant is offering free samples
This restaurant has a formal dress code and won't serve those who are underdressed
This restaurant's food comes in the form of 2d pictures which customers lick
A condiment shortage has led to ketchup scalpers
A random PC's face is on a paper that says Do Not Serve This Person Ever Again
A person wearing a grotesque costume of the restaurant's mascot is making children cry
A random PC's order is laced with speed
Someone has spiked the fountain drinks causing unexpected inebriation
Downers in a random PC's meal make them extremely relaxed and sleepy
Unknown chemicals mixed into the PCs' meals allow them to see the secret doors that Servants of the Mall use to travel
A fast-acting steroid boosts a random PC's strength but also makes them more irritable and prone to raging out
A random PC benefits from a mind-swapping experiment, trading minds with an Odd NPC who happens to be eating the same meal
The restaurant is a popular haunt for Free From Green!
The restaurant is being boycotted by Mannequins for Freedom
The restaurant is being swarmed by Collectors seeking a rare combo meal toy
The restaurant is dominated by the Council of Objects, who make up a large part of the staff
The restaurant is scheduled to be renovated by the Mall Upgraders who are taking measurements
The restaurant is under surveillance by Servants of the Mall
